titleStmt.title: An historical and geographical description of France extracted from the best authors, both ancient and modern. By J. De Lacrose, Eccl. Angl. Presb.
titleStmt.author: Lacroze, Jean Cornand de, d. ca. 1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Salusbury, and the King's-Arms, near St. Dunstans Church in fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Pages 340-399 omitted from pagination, text is continuous.
With a final leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
